unnormalised: Looks like there's some confusion over at "Sunshine Apartments". Apparently, a bunch of delivery guys are ending up at the wrong flat. Specifically, several orders are being mistakenly delivered to Flat no. 203, when they're actually meant for 204.
normalised: Looks like there is some confusion over at "Sunshine Apartments". Apparently, a bunch of delivery guys are ending up at the wrong flat. Specifically, several orders are being mistakenly delivered to Flat number two hundred and three, when they are actually meant for two hundred and four.

unnormalised: The building is at 15, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, 400050. Residents say it’s been happening for a while now. "My Zomato order ended up at 203 last week! Took me ages to get it back," said one resident, Priya Sharma from Flat 301.
normalised: The building is at fifteen, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and fifty. Residents say it has been happening for a while now. "My Zomato order ended up at two hundred and three last week! Took me ages to get it back," said one resident, Priya Sharma from Flat three hundred and one.

unnormalised: Building security is saying they're looking into it. "We've put up clearer signs, especially near the lifts," mentioned Mr. Desai, the security supervisor. He also suggested delivery partners double-check the full address, including the floor number, before handing over parcels.
normalised: Building security is saying they are looking into it. "We have put up clearer signs, especially near the lifts," mentioned Mister Desai, the security supervisor. He also suggested delivery partners double-check the full address, including the floor number, before handing over parcels.

unnormalised: Hopefully, the new measures will sort things out soon. Imagine waiting for your favourite biryani and having it end up in someone else's stomach! They should also be careful to avoid flat 20B, which is at the back of the building, as there are two flat 20’s!
normalised: Hopefully, the new measures will sort things out soon. Imagine waiting for your favourite biryani and having it end up in someone else's stomach! They should also be careful to avoid flat twenty B, which is at the back of the building, as there are two flat twenties!
